data.name: Loop Knight
data.detailed_description:
IIn fact, the only thing a knight can do is rebirth. He will overcome all the challenges again and again. However, the Knight have working years, and the retired Knight have no obligation to challenge the devil.

A retired Knight man became a factory manager, constantly producing small Knight robots. And use the robot that passed the test to harass his old friend, demon king, day and night.

You just need to click the left and right mouse button, you can play all the level, and make use of every opportunity to make continuous preparations for customs clearance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

highlighted.name: Knights are not afraid of death
The loop that can't get out
